Features.Name: Artificers Lore
Desc: Whenever you make a History check related to magic/alchemy/tech items, add +2PB.

Features.Name: Tinker
Desc: Using tinker's tools, you can spend 1 hour and 10 gp worth of materials to construct a Tiny clockwork device (AC 5, 1 hp). The device ceases to function after 24 hours unless repaired, or when dismantled. You can have up to three devices active at a time.

Option_Desc.Clockwork Toy: A toy that moves 5 feet each turn in a random direction and makes noises as appropriate to its creature type.
Option_Desc.Fire Starter: Produces a miniature flame that can light a candle, torch, or campfire. Using the device requires your action.
Option_Desc.Music Box: Plays a single song at a moderate volume. Stops when the song ends or the box is closed.
